Forsaken Iridium Mines - West.description: You stop at a big T-shaped canyon. A small river shines at the bottom. Two bridges – to the east and to the north – are broken. It looks like one of them went to the iridium mines. On the east side, you see a large truck. It is dented and its windows are broken.

Forsaken Iridium Mines - East.description: You stop at a big T-shaped canyon. A small river shines at the bottom. Two bridges — on the western and northern sides of the ravine — are destroyed. A badly damaged truck stands nearby. It looks more spacious than yours.

inspect_lorry.description:
You started checking the car. You looked at the wheel, checked under the hood, and examined the tires. The car is in bad shape, almost falling apart, but maybe it can still be made to run... The problem is, you will need to strip your own truck for parts. That means you will lose your old truck forever, together with all the upgrades. So you must think carefully.

About the broken lorry: it has a fuel tank of 100 liters, a body that can carry 16 tons, but its top speed is lower than your truck’s. Because of this, fuel use will be higher.

repair_lorry.text: Repair the lorry using parts from your old car
repair_lorry.description:
You worked on the car for a long time, fixing part after part. Finally, you poured all the fuel from the old truck into the new iron beast. At first it wouldn’t start, but after more effort — miracle! The engine came alive.

You moved your things and cargo into the new truck. Then the old one suddenly rolled into the canyon — no brakes left. A pity, but you couldn’t use it anymore anyway.

Now, you are in your new steel friend. It’s slower, but it can carry more.

Corn Farm.description:
You stopped the car on the road to look around. Nearby is a large field with corn growing in it. At the edge of the field is a well-kept little house — obviously where the farmer lives.

Right by the road is a sign:
"East direction – Hyenas hideout – 28 km,
south direction – Bolt's garage – 31 km,
west direction – Iridium mines – 60 km"

ask_questions.description: – And what questions do you have? – the big guy asked.

about_weapon.text: Do you have any weapons? I would like to buy
about_weapon.description:
– Some people use a hoe as a weapon, - came the answer. - Do you need it?

You remained silent in response.

about_money.text: I need money. Can I work on your farm?
about_money.description: – We can manage ourselves. And we don’t need anything right now…

Hyenas Hideout.description:
You stand at a large base, surrounded by a high iron wall. A man in a leather jacket, holding a spear, stands on the wall:

You are in Hyenas territory. Say why you came, or get lost while you’re still alive…

let_Kealen_go.description: Who are you to threaten us, fool?! Kealen owes us, and we set the debt at 900 credits. About 10 days left. Yes, exactly 10. And if the money isn’t here by then, Kealen won’t live.

The Stingray Bar.description:
You stopped on the road. The engine of your car kept beating a jazz rhythm under the hood. Everywhere on the side of the road were bottles, cans, and other trash. Nearby, you could see a wooden building, with drunken shouts and laughter coming from its windows. Looks like a cheap bar. Several jeeps and about ten motorcycles were parked next to it.

Looking around again, you noticed a road sign:
"East road – Gruber's fuel station – 35 km,
South road – Wreckyard – 36 km"

go_gruber.text: Go to the Gruber's fuel station

go_bar.description:
The bar was hot. Very hot. Almost unbearable. And full of cigarette smoke… But the mood was very cheerful. At the counter stood about ten guys, many of them tattooed from head to toe. In the far corner, on a table, a drox in a leather jacket was sleeping. Behind the counter, the bartender was cleaning glasses.

Looking around once more, you noticed some kind of arcade machine in the dark corner.

ask_barman_questions.text: I want to ask a few questions…
ask_barman_questions.description: – So, what do you want to ask me?

about_place.description: – Wow, man! This is a bar, a tavern, or whatever you want to call it. The Stingrays hang out here.

about_selling.description: – Us?! We sell alcohol and roasted meat. That’s all. If you want to sell us something, we don’t buy anything.

about_people.text: Who is the group at the counter?
about_people.description: – They are guys from the Stingrays gang. Can’t you see?

about_hyenas.text: Where can I find the Hyenas?

ask_barman_about_drox.text: Who is the guy sleeping on the table in the corner?
ask_barman_about_drox.description: – That’s Zarven. He spent all his money in my bar and now can’t go back to Brackenbridge. But actually, he’s a good guy. You don’t see many like him among the droxes!

about_meat.text: What kind of meat do you roast? From what animal?
about_meat.description: – O-o-o, man! You better not know…

drinks.description:
– For drinks we have:
a glass of port wine – 3 credits
a glass of Moonberry Drink (non-alcoholic) – 4 credits.

drink_port_wine.text: Drink a glass of port wine (3 Credits)
drink_port_wine.description: The bartender poured a golden drink from the bottle. You drank the glass in one gulp. It felt like fire went through your stomach. Warmth spread in your body… Then you felt sick, but luckily you held it back.

drink_cocktail.description: The bartender filled the glass with a dark red drink. It tasted nice and even a little refreshing. After you finished it, you put the glass back on the counter.

buy_drinks_everyone.text: I want to buy drinks for everyone!
buy_drinks_everyone.description: – So, does our road king want to celebrate some lucky trip, or is it just a kind gesture? Anyway, this will cost you 50 credits, my friend. Well, what do you say? – the bartender said.

treat_everyone.description:
The bartender put a box of port wine bottles on the counter.
– Oh! The brave driver is buying drinks! – shouted one of the tattooed guys.
After that, everything is blurry. You drank with the bikers, laughed, shouted crazy toasts… then darkness. Now you sit in a field, hugging a drunk punk.
– Friend, wanna join our gang? – he asked.
– Sure, – you answered with a hiccup.
The punk yelled, and soon a group of Scorpions ran up.
– Alright. To join us, you must beat me in a fistfight. Get ready!

fight.description: You stand in front of a drunk biker. He looks unfriendly. If you have the strength, maybe it’s time to punch that arrogant face.

not_fighting_with_biker.text: Hey guys! Joke’s over. I’m not fighting anymore!
not_fighting_with_biker.description:
– Coward! – your opponent waved his hand and spat on your clothes. The others did the same...

You wiped the spit off your ranger suit, took your truck, and returned to the road.

hit_head.text: Hit the biker on the head

treat_everyone_is_stingray.description:
– Our newbie is throwing a party! — shouted one of the Stingrays. The others joined in, and it all began: port wine, laughter, more port wine, more laughing, port wine, a fistfight, port wine, "chase the rabbit on a jeep", port wine… blackout.

You woke up outside next the bar. Thank God, nothing was broken. Your head hurt, but it should pass soon…

treat_everyone_is_coward.description:
We don’t drink port wine ordered by cowards! — shouted the Stingrays at the bar.
– But I do! — mumbled a toothless old man, who appeared out of nowhere. He packed all the bottles into a net bag and disappeared just as suddenly.

Ah… money wasted for nothing…

back.text: Maybe this is not for me
I'm not really interested in drinks right now

eat_mushrooms_with_meat.text: I would like to eat. Give me fried meat with mushrooms…
eat_mushrooms_with_meat.description: – Here you go, – said the bartender and put in front of you a round metal plate with a piece of fried meat, covered with pieces of mushrooms. There were no utensils, so you had to eat with your hands. The taste was quite okay. At least it stopped your hunger well.

sleep_in_bar.text: I need to sleep. Give me one bed…
sleep_in_bar.description:
– Of course. Follow me, – said the bartender, signaling a boy.
The boy took you to the second floor, to a room where a couple of people were already sleeping on separate beds, and showed you your bed. After giving the money, you collapsed on the bed and fell asleep…

You woke up on your own. You feel much better now. Looking at the clock above the door, you see that your sleep time is almost over. It’s time to go downstairs.

go_to_rockers.description:
– Hi! – you said friendly.

– Get out of here, idiot! – shouted a big guy with a stingray tattoo on his forehead.

Hmm… You can’t approach guys like this easily.

go_to_rockers_is_stingray.description: – Our young stingray. What do you want? – asked the biker with the word Grog tattooed on his chin. It was the same guy you fought the other day.

ask_about_weapon.text: Do you have any serious weapons? I would buy...
ask_about_weapon.description: – Every Stingray makes his own crossbow and carries it through life. A Stingray who sells his crossbow is despised and must be killed on the spot… And other weapons? We don’t respect them. Remember that.

have_some_fun.text: Let's go have some fun. Scare people. Rob them!!!
have_some_fun.description: – We just came back from a job. Made some money. Now we’ll stay here for a week or two. So better hang out with us for now. Drink some port wine, – said Grog.

crush_hyenas.description:
Grog almost choked on his drink:
– Are you crazy? You want your head cut off, and all Stingrays with it? Listen — now is not the time to fight the Hyenas. We just made peace with them about splitting the territory...

talk.description: You spent about ten minutes chatting with the rockers about engines, crossbows, and drinks. Nothing useful came out of it.

go_to_drox.description: – Huh? What? – the drox got worried. – Listen. You look like a driver. Can you take me to Brakenbridge? I’ll be grateful! Don’t worry. I’m in my sleep period now. I’ll sleep in the seat – you won’t even notice me. And when we arrive, shake me well. I’ll wake up. So? Will you give me a ride?

take_drox.description:
– Thanks, brother. Don’t worry. I will sleep right away in the cabin and will not disturb you.

You walked the drox to the truck and locked him in the cabin. And true — he fell asleep at once! But you still took out the spark plug. Just in case.

back.text: Sorry, I’m busy with other things right now.

go_to_slot_machine.description:
On the slot machine, there is a metal sign:
Insert 1 credit and pull the handle.
Double number match – win 2 credits,
Triple number match – win 25 credits.

Gruber's Fuel Station.description:
Your truck stopped at the crossing of two roads. The asphalt here was very cracked, but you didn’t care. Nearby, you saw an old gas station fenced with barbed wire. At least, that’s what the sign said. A dirt road led to the building.

Near the crossroads, you saw a road sign:
"North – Iridium mines – 34 km,
South – Endless Rift – 57 km,
West – Bar – 35 km,
East – Bolt's Garage – 42 km"

go_iridium_mines.text: Go to the forsaken iridium mines

go_gas_station.description:
You drove along a country road and stopped right in front of a building. A boy with a rifle on his shoulder quickly came out. Coming to your truck window, he said:

– You are at Gruber's Fuel Station. 5 liters of fuel cost 7 credits. Will you buy some?

gruber_fill_up_5.description:
You bought 5 liters of fuel.

– You are at Gruber's Gas Station. Five liters of fuel cost 7 credits. Do you want more?

gruber_fill_up_15.description:
You bought 15 liters of fuel.

– You are at Gruber's Gas Station. Five liters of fuel cost 7 credits. Do you want more?

about_fixing.text: I need to fix my vehicle. Can I do it here?
about_fixing.description: – We don’t fix vehicles. It’s better to go east. Bolt lives there – the best mechanic around. He will fix your ride in no time.

about_weapon.description: – We have some, – the boy smirked. – But if you’re asking for yourself, I suggest looking somewhere else. Around here, everyone needs guns.

about_gas.text: Where do you get your fuel from?
about_gas.description: – Our gas station is on an oil field. We pump oil from the well and make fuel right here. Everyone knows that. But if anyone tries to mess with us, we will fight back, – the boy pointed to his rifle. – By the way, Dex’s Gas Station works the same way, if you’re interested.

about_gruber.text: If this is Gruber's Gas Station, where is Gruber himself?
about_gruber.description: – Old man Gruber doesn’t fill cars with fuel himself. He deals with bigger matters. That’s it.

Bolt's Garage.description:
A strange area. All around were scattered pieces of metal and car parts. Nearby stood a wooden shack with a garage. Looks like this is the mechanic’s workshop.

Right in front of you was a road sign made entirely from car parts:
"North – Corn farm – 31 km,
South – Marshal – 28 km,
West – Fuel station – 42 km,
Eest – Brackenbridge – 22 km"

go_gruber.text: Go to the Gruber's fuel station

go_garage.description:
Your truck is parked by a garage. Inside, there is another car. Right in front of your hood stands a man who just came out of the garage. He wears a greasy cloth jumpsuit, black welding glasses, and holds a wrench.

– Do you need something from Bolt? – he asks. This must be Bolt. He looks like a real car fan. And the name fits.

fix_truck.text: I need to fix my truck…

repair_truck.description:
You paid the agreed sum. Bolt drove the truck into the garage, lifted it with a portable crane, and started the repair.

The mechanic worked like a real master – it was a pleasure to watch.

– Done! – Bolt shouted, rolling the car outside. Now it shines like the polar star. No dents, no scratches. Perfect job!

back.text: I'm not ready for such expenses...

improve_truck.text: I see you really love your work. Can you also upgrade my truck?
improve_truck.description:
Bolt walked around the truck, looked at everything carefully, and said:

– Here’s the deal. I can make two steel trunks and weld them on your truck. Then you can carry 2 tons more. I won’t charge much. Let’s say 50 credits.

I could also put spikes instead of wheels on your truck. For that, I need long iron rods. I don’t have many left. But if you bring me 5 tons of scrap metal, I could definitely find everything I need there. And the rest would be mine as payment.

Of course, I don’t like carrying scrap myself, but I promise you – the result is worth it. Tested in practice. Enemy vehicles get smashed! Especially the Stingrays gang’s jeeps.

extend_trunk.text: Deal. I’ll pay, and you make my truck carry more.
extend_trunk.description:
Taking your money, Bolt went into his garage. You heard bangs, scraping, and hissing. What was he doing in there? While you wondered, the mechanic came out driving a strange loader with a big box in its claws. He welded the box to the side of your truck. Then he did the same on the other side.

— Done! Now your cargo bed can hold 2 more tons, — Bolt said.

You looked out the truck window. Indeed, each box could fit at least a ton of goods.

upgrade_truck.text: I have 5 tons of scrap metal. Take it and start working!
upgrade_truck.description:
With a magnetic loader, Bolt quickly took 5 tons of scrap from you and piled it nearby. Then the work began. The master picked rods and sheets of metal, shaped them, and made cones. To each cone he attached sharp blades. Finally, Bolt fixed these creations onto your wheels.

And done! Now your steel beast looked really scary.

back.text: Alright. Let’s talk about other matters instead.

about_kealen.text: The Hyenas kidnapped a guy named Kealen. Can you help me rescue him?
about_kealen.description: – The Hyenas are serious guys. I don’t want to fight with them. So, sorry.

about_selling.text: Do you sell anything? Or buy anything?
about_selling.description: – Why? I fix cars, and I like it. If I need something, I go to Brackenbridge or the Varnock brothers.

Brackenbridge.description:
You are standing on the edge of a big city (big for these lands), surrounded by a fence. From the highway, a good asphalt road leads into the city, with a sign that says: “Welcome to Brackenbridge.”

Right nearby you noticed a road sign:
“West – Bolt's garage – 22 km,
South – Dex's Fuel Station – 97 km”

go_dex.text: Go to the Dex's fuel station

go_to_factory.description:
A dirty man leans out of the booth at the factory entrance and looks at you closely:

- As usual, we don’t sell anything, only buy. Prices haven’t changed since last week.
1 ton of scrap metal – 23 credits
1 ton of coal – 12 credits

about_factory.description: - Right now, we work with rolled metal. But in a month, we’ll start making industrial goods, and in half a year, we might take on cars and maybe even weapons! Just don’t tell anyone too much about this. You never know…

go_to_clinic.description:
The little house was full of all kinds of equipment. On the right, there were several medical-looking devices in strange shapes. There was even a rusty machine with a big sign saying “Drill.” It looked like some kind of ancient torture tool.

Opposite the door, on a shabby little couch, a small man in a spotless white coat was snoring. On his chest lay a little mirror with a hole and a strap. It seemed the medical expert didn’t want to work today, but you would have to wake him. Knocking loudly on the door made the doctor stir.

– Huh? What? Only here! Energy treatment using a new revolutionary method. Complete wound healing. All for 50 credits.

energy_treatment.text: My health isn’t great. Some energy treatment could help…
energy_treatment.description:
– Energy treatment? Sure, – the doctor took your money, sat you in a hard chair, put on a helmet and electrodes, strapped your arms, and pulled a big lever with a laugh.

A strong shock ran through your body. You thought it was the end, but soon the current grew weaker and you felt energy filling you. You closed your eyes and fell asleep.

You woke up to the doctor patting your cheeks.

– Wake up, it’s done, – he said, removing the wires.

Standing up, you really felt better. Not much fresher, but healthier.

about_treatments.text: What other procedures can you do?
about_treatments.description:
– We also perform brain transplants (the head, of course), removal of hairs from heels and fins (for muttokes and droxes respectively), and, – the doctor leaned closer and whispered – we transplant… private parts for ools. What exactly are you interested in?

– No, no. None of the above, – you replied quickly.

– That’s a pity. Really a pity. Anything else?

back.text: I’ll take my leave and step outside.

go_to_hotel.description:
Inside, the hotel turned out to be fairly clean.

- Want to rest, cowboy? – asked a made-up lady sitting at the reception. – Eight hours in a single room – 20 credits. If you want it with a girl, th-e-e-n… 40 credits.

rest.text: Just give me a room. No girls needed.
rest.description: The room was very good, and with no neighbors around, you rested well. You came back to the reception desk.

take_girl.text: Girls are beautiful. So I’ll take the full package.
take_girl.description:
The lady from reception found you a girl to your taste and sent you to the room.

Everything went great — even some plaster fell off the walls. You had a good rest! When you woke up, the girl was already gone. A pity, you wanted more. After fixing your hair and clothes, you returned to the reception desk.

go_to_restaurant.description:
Grabbing the restaurant door handle, you noticed a sign on the glass:
"Open.
The restaurant operates daily:
from 9:00 until the last visitor after 23:59."

Noting this, you went inside. There weren’t many people, so you easily found a table.
Shall we order something? — asked the Chaldean waiter, dressed in a neat suit, handing you the menu.
You quickly looked through the options, noting what you could afford and what was too expensive.

order_root.description: You quickly finished the roots. Not quite like the ones you’ve had at Earth diners, but still decent. Too bad the portion was a bit small…

order_cactus.text: Signature Dish: Spiky Cactus in Coriander Glaze – 23 credits

back.text: Thanks for the warm welcome. I think I’ll be going.

go_to_cityhall.text: Enter the house with the flag
go_to_cityhall.description:
You pushed open the massive wooden door and stepped inside the snow-white house. To the left of the entrance, behind a sturdy desk, sat a woman typing something on a typewriter. Without looking up from her work, she said:
— The mayor won’t be here for a while. So, please leave the premises.

Well, nothing to do about it — you’ll have to go.

discover_city.text: Walk around the city to find other interesting places

coins_for_beggar.text: Throw a couple of coins to the old man
coins_for_beggar.description:
– Thank you, son, – the old man said. I see you’re a traveler. Let me give you some advice. On the road from city to Dex's fuel station, there’s a turn to a lake. It looks dirty and small, but if you swim there for fifteen minutes, your wounds will heal as if by magic. Now go in peace.

Remembering his words, you left the city.

sleep_in_truck.description:
You pushed some junk away and tried to sleep on the seats of your truck. But you didn’t sleep long — people walking around woke you up. And it wasn’t very comfortable anyway.

At least it cost nothing!

Wreckyard.description:
Your car stopped at a fork in the road. To the northwest, a huge wreckyard rose up.

A road sign with a skull on top said:
"North – Bar – 36 km,
South – Erratic Rocks – 49 km,
East – The Endless Rift – 40 km"

go_wreckyard.description:
The vehicle skillfully entered the scrapyard. You were about to delve deeper into the trash maze, but a three-meter-tall robot blocked your way. Rusty as it was, it looked impressive…

- You’re in the Varnock brothers’ territory, gringo! – said the man inside the robot. – If you’re here on business, know this: we currently have 50 tons of scrap metal. 10 creditss per ton. The scrap is pressed and neatly packed—top quality stuff.

buy_one_t.text: I’ll take one ton of scrap metal

buy_three_t.text: I’ll take three tons of scrap metal

buy_all.text: I’ll take all the remaining scrap metal

take_full_trunk.text: I’ll load up with scrap metal to the brim

ask_question.text: I’ve got a couple of questions
ask_question.description: — And what do you want to ask about, gringo?

about_wreckyard.text: Why do some signs say “military base” instead of “wreckyard”?
about_wreckyard.description:
– Long ago, there was a big military base here, built before the Galactic Commonwealth. After many years the tech got old, so the army took useful parts, packed them up, and left. What was left turned into this junkyard.

Later, me and my brothers took the place. Now it’s our small family business, and no Stingrays or Hyenas can boss us around.

The man lifted a robot’s steel arm – with a scary blaster on it.

about_kealen.text: I’m looking for Kealen. Where is he?
about_kealen.description: – Kealen? I think he owes the Hyenas, and they’re keeping him prisoner. They’re asking for ransom… That’s all I’ve heard, unfortunately, – said Varnock.

about_weapon.description: – What weapons, buddy! Me and my brothers found a few guns in the junkyard, but they’re all ours. You get it — around here, you need weapons for yourself.

about_metal.description: – In Brackenbridge, our town, they’ll gladly buy it from you

back.text: I’d like to trade with you some more
Alright. Farewell, lad, I’m heading out

The Endless Rift.description:
You are standing in the middle of a huge rift, more like a giant crack in the Earth left after the explosion of a massive bomb. The road splits into two directions. Nearby stands a crooked sign with words painted in red.

"North – Fuel station – 57 km,
South – Marshal – 19 km, 
East – Wreckyard – 40"

go_gruber.text: Go to the Gruber's fuel station

Spaceport.description:
Your steel friend is standing at the entrance to the airport.

The road sign says:
"Eastern direction - Erratic Rocks - 28 km"

go_spaceport.description: At the airport, everything is as usual. Your starship, the hut, the plateau…

enter_hut.description:
The interior matched the outside of the house — all the furniture was old and seemed on its last legs. You shifted your gaze to Ramina.

- Do you want to tell me something? Or ask about anything? — the woman asked, holding on a leash two furry creatures that looked like either hairy crocodiles or something else entirely.

about_kealen.description: - After the bridge to the iridium mines broke, things got very bad for us. Kealen had a new risky idea and borrowed 450 credits from the Hyenas. But it went wrong again, and we couldn’t pay back in time. The Hyenas don’t like waiting. They found out Kealen has a rich uncle and took my husband so the uncle would pay them with interest. But where will they get credits? – Cathena’s eyes filled with tears.

about_hyenas.text: Where can I find the Hyenas?
about_hyenas.description: - Usually they find everyone themselves… But if you want to know about their base, it’s to the north-east, past the Corn Farm.

about_dangers.text: What dangers might I face here?
about_dangers.description: - Dangers? This whole area is full of danger! On the roads, Stingrays and Hyenas charge tolls. Plus, all sorts of thugs wander around. You must always stay alert here. And don’t sleep in your car or outside — there are lots of poisonous creatures. Only in Breakenbridge can you feel safe.

about_earning.text: Where can I get some money?
about_earning.description: - My husband earned money by trading. But how can you trade if you have no money…? I heard you can work in the mining settlement, digging coal, to get some starting money. Also, my husband told me that in Brackenbrigde, our biggest city, they need coal and scrap metal. You can buy coal from the miners.

about_climate.description: - The climate is dry. It’s bright during the day, and at night there is twilight. But it never gets completely dark. So here, many people sleep when they are tired, not when night comes.

about_rest.text: Can I spend the night here?
about_rest.description: - Unfortunately, no. At night my boys, – the woman pointed to the furry creatures – get aggressive. Especially to strangers. They could even attack. I can’t risk your life. Too much depends on you… By the way! You can sleep for free in the miners’ barracks. Drive to the Erratic Rocks, then south to the mining settlement.

leave_planet.text: Had enough of everything. Time to leave this planet

Erratic Rocks.description:
Your car is driving along the highway. The Erratic Rocks are already clearly visible.

You notice a rusty sign on the right. It seems to have been standing here for a thousand years!
"Northern direction - Military base (crossed out, "Wreckyard" written above) - 49 km,
Southern direction - Mining Settlement - 32 km,
Western direction - Spaceport - 28 km"

go_wreckyard.text: Go to the military base (or wreckyard?)

Marshal.description:
Your truck is parked in a very scenic place. To the north, you see a huge sinkhole in the ground, cacti are growing all around, and not far away stands a white two-story building with a torn flag on the roof. Looks like this is where the sheriff lives.

Nearby, you notice a surprisingly clean road sign:
"North – Endless Rift – 19 km,
South – Dex's fuel station – 40 km,
East – Bolt's garage – 28 km"

go_dex.text: Go to the Dex's fuel station

go_marshal.description:
You drove on a dirt road and soon reached the building. After a minute, you were at the door. It opened, and a man with a marshal’s star on his chest and two pistols on his belt came out. Two more men followed him.

The man with the star said:

– I’m the Marshal. Who are you?

– Ranger. I come in peace.

– You must be new… Listen: if you make serious trouble here — especially in Brackenbridge — you’ll answer to me and my men.

- Do you have business here? – the Marshal asked, keeping his hand near his holster.

about_kealen.text: The Hyenas kidnapped Kealen. Please help me rescue him…
about_kealen.description: The Hyenas? You think I’d risk trouble with them over some Kealen? I don’t even know who that is. Anyway, the Hyenas are serious people. If you want to talk to them, look for them in the north-east — past the Corn Farm.

about_bandits.text: On the roads, some thugs attack honest people. I think, as Sheriff, you should stop this…
about_bandits.description:
– Really? — laughed the marshal with his men. — You’re not from here. Stingrays and Hyenas have charged tolls for decades. If I fight them, the bandits might stop me before I stop them.

My advice: pay the tolls if stopped, or fight if you’re tough. Carrying cargo? Expect higher fees. My guys? They just fine lawbreakers. Doubts? Come to the impound lot, we’ll sort it out.

about_weapon.text: I need weapons. Do you have anything?
about_weapon.description: You think I’d give a rogue like you a weapon? Bold! But… if you help us, I might give you a pack of shotgun ammo. You good with chemistry?

accept.description:
– Great! – shouted the marshal and waved for you to follow.

You walked past cells and old rooms, keeping the marshal in sight. Finally, he led you to a small room. A thin guy with a book sat on a metal box.

Here. He will help you. He knows some chemistry. Explain what to do…

 - I won’t make drugs! – you said immediately.

- Oh? Can you? – the chemist asked.
You shook your head.

Too bad. Anyway, we need help for something else. We want to open a safe with cyclobeasing acid. I almost made it – just need to add x-gluconate. Here’s the problem: instructions say 3 grams of Viron (it has the right amount of x-gluconate). But I only have Kreman. Kreman also has x-gluconate. But how much per gram? I don’t know. So how many grams of Kreman should replace 3 grams of Viron?

- Any other info? – you asked.

– Some. I found it in a textbook:
1 gram Sorben + 2 grams Ilium = x-gluconate in 4 grams Kreman
3 grams Ilium = x-gluconate in 1 gram Viron
1 gram Ilium + 3 grams Kreman = x-gluconate in 2 grams Sorben

– That’s all? – you asked.

– Yes. So… how many grams of Kreman do we need? Be careful – wrong amount = boom.

back.text: To be honest, I don’t really understand this stuff, so I can’t help you.

Forest Lake.description: You see a dirt road leading somewhere.

go_dex.text: Go to the Dex's fuel station

go_lake.description: You followed the road and soon reached a small lake covered with green moss. The trip here was about fifteen kilometers.

swim.text: Swim in the water for five minutes
swim.description: You swam in the water for five minutes. In such water, it didn’t give you much pleasure. Only made you feel more tired.

more_swim.description: You swam in the water for five minutes. In such water, it didn’t give you much pleasure. Only made you feel more tired.

back.text: Get out of the water, dry off, and head back to the road

rinse_off.text: Rinse off in the lake and go back

Mining Settlement.description:
Your car is standing on a wide asphalt road. Right nearby rises a giant mountain, and at its foot lies a small miners’ settlement.

And by the road, as always, stands a sign:
“North – Erratic Rocks – 32 km,
East – Dex’s Fuel Station – 46 km”

go_dex.text: Go to the Dex's fuel station

go_mines.description: You are on sandy ground. Around you, there are only barracks and miners all covered in black coal. Close by, you see a small stall where a thin man gives miners some green stuff. Not far is a clean building with a sign “Trading House.” You can also see the entrance to the mine.

go_to_trading_house.description:
You are in a room full of coal bags. A man in a helmet sits on a small chair near the door.

– Here’s the deal. We sell coal for 5 credits per ton. The coal is clean and ready to use, so no problems. Right now, we have 75 tons of coal in stock.

Also, we buy food. Especially corn. We pay 45 credits per ton. Miners eat corn with great appetite!

ask_question.description: – You can ask your questions. But only about business. I won’t answer the others, – said the man.

about_buy_corn.description: – Where? At corn farm to the east.

about_sell_coal.description: – In Brackenbribge, the city to the east, - came the answer.

about_earn.text: I need money. How can I earn it?
about_earn.description: – Oh-oh-oh! You came to the right place. Our mines are always happy to get new workers. Working here, you can earn up to three credits per hour. Not bad, right?

enter_barracks.description: You enter one of the barracks and see many two-level bunks. Almost all of them are taken by sleeping miners. But you notice one free bunk.

sleep.description:
Surprisingly, as soon as you lay down, you fell asleep right away…

— Hey, get up! — you heard someone’s voice. — You’ve been sleeping for three hours. Your time is up...
— What, were you timing me? — you mumbled angrily.
— Are you stupid? The bunks have timers.

You opened your eyes and saw a timer, a big red hand holding it, and finally its owner — a huge, angry, dirty miner. Not wanting to argue, you got off the bunk. Well… you didn’t get to sleep as much as you wanted, but it was better than nothing.

go_to_stall.description:
The drox silently hands out food to the miners, working with all four of his hands.
On the counter below, a sign reads: Portion of Nutritious Porridge – 1 credit.

buy_porridge.description:
The drox took the coin, pressed a lever on some machine, and half a minute later the device spat out a portion of yellow mush. Dropping THIS onto a plate, the drox stuck a metal spoon in and handed it to you.

— Bring the dish back, — he muttered.

You nodded.

The taste was even worse than the look. You managed a couple of spoons, but with each one it was harder to fight the urge to vomit. Finally, your stomach rebelled, and you threw up. Seems you weren’t hungry enough to finish that yellow substance.

enter_mine.description:
It was very dark inside the mine, but soon your eyes adjusted. The weak light of several lamps let you see what was going on. Dozens of people in helmets were busy digging coal.

You kept going deeper, when suddenly a huge miner stepped in front of you.

— Hey! Why aren’t you working?! Take this pickaxe and get to it!!! — he roared, staring at you.

work.text: Take the pickaxe and start working
work.description:
– That’s it! One hour is over, – the huge miner shouted behind you.
He wrote your name on the bag, put it on the lift, and said:
– Go upstairs for your pay.

At the mine exit, a dirty man with a notebook was already waiting.
– I weighed the bag. About one and a half tons. Good! You earned three credits.

back.text: I just came here to look around. I’m not a worker

Dex's Fuel Station.description:
You stopped at a crossroads, thinking about where to go next. Looking around, you noticed a rather impressive building with the sign “Dex’s Fuel Station.” To be honest, the building looked more like a watchtower.

On a dry tree you saw a board with inscriptions:
“West – Mines – 46 km,
North – Marshal – 40 km,
East – the fine city of Brackenbridge – 97 km”

go_dex.description:
A steel building with cannons everywhere looked very serious.

– 1 liter of fuel costs 1 credits, – said a metallic voice. – Give money to the robot, and it will do everything.

Looking around, you noticed a fat woman sitting inside a spherical defense gun attached to the ceiling.

fill_five_liters.description:
You bought 5 liters of fuel.

– 1 liter of fuel costs 1 chervonets, – the metallic voice said. – Give money to the robot, and it will do everything.

Maybe buy more?

fill_fifteen_liters.description:
You bought 15 liters of fuel.

– 1 liter of fuel costs 1 chervonets, – the metallic voice said. – Give money to the robot, and it will do everything.

Maybe buy more?

about_fixing.text: I need to fix my vehicle. Can I do it here?
about_fixing.description:
– Go to the garage. Dex will check your car, – said the woman.

The gates started to lift, and you drove in. Inside, the garage was full of all kinds of metal junk: mufflers, engines, gas tanks, springs. Among it all, a person in a work suit was moving around. This must be Lou.

I’ll take a look, – said the mechanic, checking the car. After 15 minutes, he finished. – Your car is almost completely fine. I don’t see any reason to fix it!

Nothing to do, you had to leave the garage empty-handed.

about_trading.description: Another trader on my head! How many times do I have to say – we have everything. We don’t need ANYTHING!!!

about_gas.text: Where do you get your fuel from?
about_gas.description: – None of your business, – came the reply.
